text.text_translated:
NEOs are rocks in space.
Asteroids are also rocks in space.
NASA wants to find more middle-sized NEOs.
NASA can find them only if it gets money.
NASA wants to build a machine called NEOCam.
It is a space telescope.
It is 0.5 metres wide.
It will be in space.
It will use infrared light.
This light helps it find asteroids.
If NASA gets the money, it can probably find them in ten years.
After NASA finds the asteroids, it will make a list of them.
Then, a team will have an important job.
This team is the planet safety team.
This team keeps the planet safe.
They will need to find a way to stop the dangerous asteroids.
These asteroids are called PHAs.
The team must stop PHAs from hitting the planet.

best_attempt.text_translated:
NEOs are rocks in space.
NASA wants to find middle-sized NEOs.
But NASA can only find them if it gets money.
NASA wants to build a special telescope.
Its name is NEOCam.
This telescope will be in space.
It is 0.5 metres wide.
It will use infrared light.
It will use this light to find asteroids.
If NASA gets the money, it can probably reach its goal in ten years.
After NASA finds the NEOs, it will write them down.
Then, the team that protects the planet will start.
This team still needs to know how to defend the planet.
They need to stop very dangerous asteroids from hitting the planet.
These very dangerous asteroids are called PHAs.
